column2: Added ability to patch python command line via Python sdk flavor

column3: Allow plugin sdk to override command line when running python tools

Hi Kiryl,
thanks for the pull request.
Could you please explain what kind of command line patching you would like to provide in a flavor?

Hi Dmitry,
Our interpreter uses custom arguments and need to setup the environment correctly. In some cases we need to redirect to another helper script entirely
